name: Start From Nothing LD45
description:
Controls :

Space / Left Mouse - Pulse (on beat)

WASD - Move

  • Press space on the beat to create a pulse
  • Pulses knock back or harm, attached creatures
  • Run into surfaces to drop spores
  • Pulse spores to germinate them
  • Creatures will eat your flowers

+ / - (on numpad) change bpm
